ValidationRule.description: Requires a non-zero value to be present in "Retention Days" if "Persist Latest Exchange Rates" is TRUE.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Persist_Latest_Ex_Rates__c == TRUE, OR( ISBLANK( Retention_Days__c ), Retention_Days__c = 0 ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please provide a non-zero value for "Retention Days" if setting "Persist Latest Exchange Rates" to TRUE.
